save_success_message.description: after the user has saved a page successfully

save_failed_message.description: after the user has failed to save a page

save_progress_message.description: while the user is saving a page

save_settings_message.message: You need to setup app token in extension's options menu first.
save_settings_message.description: app token is needed for extension to work

save_server_down_message.message: Remote server appear to be down.

save_invalid_json_message.message: Remote server returned invalid json. You can report it to @bitinn on twitter.
save_invalid_json_message.description: for when server is returning non-json response, usually means server error

app_description.message: Save your current url to rubu.me, for viewing or sharing later
